welcome.title: Welcome to Snippeta!
welcome.content: Snippeta is the best way to copy, paste, and manage snippets of text! Copy text to your clipboard with a single tap; no highlighting or long-tapping!

gettingStarted.title: Getting started
gettingStarted.content: Tap here to copy this snippet to your clipboard, or tap the "Add snippet" button above to create a new snippet!

organizeGroups.title: Organize by creating groups
organizeGroups.content: Create a snippet group to organize and nest snippets. Tap here to try it out!

goPro.title: Go PRO to do more!
goPro.content: Get access to Cloud sync, creating sub-groups, pro themes, and more with a Snippeta Pro subscription!

addSnippetsToGroup.title: Add snippets to this group
addSnippetsToGroup.content: Tap the "Add snippet" button above to try it out!
